Mu ijambo rya muganga Dr Branth w'ibitaro bya Umea University biri gukurikirana uriya mugabo, yatangaje ko hari uburyo inyamaswa ziba mu rubura zigira ku buryo iyo hakonje ziryama zikamara igihe kirekire zitava aho ziri mu rwego rwo kuzigama imbaraga kuko nta mafunguro biba bifite. Ubu buryo bwitwa hibernation, mu ndimi z'amahanga. Ngo birakekwa ko n'uriya mugabo aribwo buryo umubiri we waba wari urimo. Kugeza ubu biratangazwa ko ameze neza nta kibazo.
